mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_category_name, board_title, board_writer, board_password, board_content, board_view, board_write_date) VALUES(#{boardCategoryName},#{boardTitle},#{boardWriter},#{boardPassword},#{boardContent},0,now())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_view=#{boardView}+1 WHERE board_no =#{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.board_category_no, b.board_title, b.board_writer, b.board_content, b.board_view, b.board_write_date, b.board_update_date, bc.board_category_name FROM board b JOIN board_category bc ON b.board_category_no = bc.board_category_no WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_writer= #{boardWriter}, board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_update_date=NOW() WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_reply (board_no, board_reply_content, board_reply_date) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{boardReplyContent}, NOW())
